# filter-tags

Filter tags

Example:
```html
<filter-tags></filter-tags>
```

```

## Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are available for styling:

| Custom property | Description     | Default        |
|:----------------|:----------------|:--------------:|
| --filter-tags-scope      | scope description | default value  |
| --filter-tags  | empty mixin     | {}             |
